titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending the 2011 National Veterans Wheelchair Games, to be held in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania August 1, through August 6, 2011.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 7/30/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the significant contribution that the National Veterans Wheelchair Games make to the lives of disabled veterans who selflessly served the United States. Commends the organizers and volunteers of and the participants in the 2011 National Veterans Wheelchair Games for their efforts in the service of the United States.
